short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension turns the Global Shipping Program (GSP) fine print red on eBay items pages, when GSP items are shown

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
The eBay Global Shipping Programme (GSP) reserves the right to change shipping rates, collect import taxes and VAT, after a buyer has committed to buy.
eBay automatically enrolls sellers in this programme.

On more than one occasion I have bought an item, only to be ripped off by Pitney Bowes during check-out because this (substantially different contract) is "communicated" to the buyer in a useless gray tiny font. 
Almost as if they really did not want you to notice ...

This extension helps people see the fine print, before clicking buy.

Icons graciously provided by icons8.com:
https://icons8.com/license
